SQLite
Class BlobW

java.lang.Object

      SQLite.BlobW
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
 class BlobW
extends java.io.OutputStream

Internal class implementing java.io.OutputStream on SQLite 3.4.0 incremental blob I/O interface.
